Articles.Content: I launched a rocket that looked like a Starlink probe with ion engines. I sent it into space. The probe had a reason to connect probes orbiting the sun and Eve to kerbin. The probe used two encounters from the Mun and Minmus to get onto the edge of kerbin’s SOI. The probe at its AP and PE was going around 200m/s. It was also receiving signals all over the Kerbol Sysytem. Mission Sueccess!
